com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.handlers

Class SCUIXAPIAggregatorMashupHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.handlers.SCUIXAPIAggregatorMashupHandler

  • public class SCUIXAPIAggregatorMashupHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUIAggregateXAPIMashupHandler class flattens an aggregate mashup and caches the leaf mashup metadat list per aggregate mashupId. This class also helps create a MultiAPi input element per XAPI endpoint by merging the dynamic input from the request and static input from the mashup.xml. This class also helps update the request with the output elements for all the output namespaces.
    The rules for creating aggregate mashups are:
    • A mashup can contain only one input namespace but can have multiple output namespaces. This is usually a result of merged mashups. When the input namespace and mashup ids are same, the call is merged as one.
    • Two different mashups can contain the same input namespace. But should contain different output namespace.
    • Two different mashups cANNOT contain same output namespace. One result might override another.
    • If two mashups, with same mashup id, are found with different endpoints one is ignored.
    rasrinivasan

    • Method Detail

      • getMashupList

        public static java.util.ArrayList getMashupList(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                java.lang.String mashupId)
        This method returns an ArrayList containing the flattened leaf mashup metadatas as (@link SCUIMultiMashupLeafMetaData} objects in the Aggregate mashup given the uiContext and mashupId. It will also check if the user is authorized to access the mashupId if a resourceId is given in the aggregate mashup and throws SCUIAuthorizationException. uiContext of the type SCUIContext mashupId of the type String ArrayList containing the flattened mashups as SCUIMultiMashupLeafMetaData objects

      • isLeafMashupsAuthorized

        public static void isLeafMashupsAuthorized(java.util.ArrayList leafMashups,
                                           SCUIContext uiContext)
        isLeafMashupsAuthorized() method checks for authorization permission in all the leaf mashups. leafMashups is a list containing either leaf objects of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeaf or leaf meta data objects of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeafMetaData uiContext is of type SCUIContext

      • getInputNs

        public static java.lang.Object getInputNs(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                          java.lang.String mashupId)
        This method gets all input namespaces of all the leaf mashups as HashSet for the given aggregate MashupId. uiContext is of type SCUIContext mashupId is of type String a HashSet containing all the inputNS. It can return an empty set.

      • createLeafMashup

        public java.util.ArrayList createLeafMashup(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                            java.lang.String mashupId,
                                            java.util.HashMap inputElbyInputNS)
        This method creates the actual leaf mashup of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeaf with the leaf metaData of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeafMetaData as attribute and merged input element as attribute. This method is called with a map containing the dynamic input element from request as value per input namespace as key. uiContext of the type SCUIContext mashupId is of the type String. inputElbyInputNS is of the type HashMap with inputNS as key and dynamic input Element from request as value. ArrayList containing the actual leaf mashup of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeaf

      • getInputApiElement

        public java.util.HashMap getInputApiElement(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                            java.lang.String mashupId,
                                            java.util.HashMap inputElbyInputNS)
        This method fetches the multiAPI input element per endpoint and returns an HashMap containing it. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext mashupId is of the type String and contains the value of aggregator mashup's id. inputElbyInputNS is of the type HashMap with inputNS as key and dynamic input Element from request as value. a HashMap with endpoint as String and multiAPIinput element as value.

      • createInputApiElement

        public void createInputApiElement(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                  java.util.ArrayList flattenedMashups,
                                  java.util.HashMap multiAPIDocByEndPointMap)
        This method creates the multiAPI input element per endpoint and returns an HashMap containing it. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext flattenedMashups is a list of all the leaf mashups and is of type SCUIXAPIMashupLeaf multiAPIDocByEndPointMap a HashMap with endpoint as String and multiAPIinput element as value.

      • processOutput

        public void processOutput(SCUIContext uiContext,
                          java.util.HashMap outputElByEndPoint,
                          boolean setOutputInRequest)
        This method sets the output element of the multiApi result into the request for each output namespace in the aggregate mash definition, and similarly updates the SCUIGUIDataContext also. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext outputElByEndPoint is of the type HashMap with endpoint as key and output element as value setOutputInRequest if set to true the output is set in request according to the namespace and similarly updates the gui data context also. SCUIGUIDataContext#addScreenData(String, Object)

        protected void validateLeafMashupInput(SCUIContext context,
                                       java.lang.String mashupId,
